Class MapManager

java.lang.Object
org.geotools.tutorial.txtreader.MapManager
public class MapManager extends Object
MapManager: Utility class for managing map content and layers.

  • Method Details

    • getMap

      public org.geotools.map.MapContent getMap()
      Retrieves the MapContent managed by this MapManager.
      Returns:
      the MapContent object that is being managed.

    • getLayerCount

      public int getLayerCount()
      Retrieves the number of layers in the managed MapContent.
      Returns:
      the total number of FeatureLayer's in the map.

    • addLayer

      public void addLayer(org.geotools.api.data.SimpleFeatureSource featureSource, org.geotools.api.style.Style style) throws Exception
      Adds a new FeatureLayer to the managed MapContent using the specified SimpleFeatureSource and Style.
      Parameters:
      featureSource - the SimpleFeatureSource providing the data for the new layer.
      style - the Style to be applied to the new layer.
      Throws:
      Exception - if featureSource or style are invalid

    • removeLayer

      public void removeLayer(int id) throws Exception
      Removes a FeatureLayer from the managed MapContent by its id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the FeatureLayer to be removed.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if id does not exist in map.
      Exception
